verses.verse: ( Conquest of the Northern Cities) וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> way·hî Now when כִּשְׁמֹ֖עַ <WH8085> kiš·mō·a‘ heard about these things, יָבִ֣ין <WH2985> yā·ḇîn Jabin מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> me·leḵ- king חָצ֑וֹר <WH2674> ḥā·ṣō·wr of Hazor וַיִּשְׁלַ֗ח <WH7971> way·yiš·laḥ he sent word אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to יוֹבָב֙ <WH3103> yō·w·ḇāḇ Jobab מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> me·leḵ king מָד֔וֹן <WH4068> mā·ḏō·wn of Madon; וְאֶל־ <WH413> wə·’el- to מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> me·leḵ the kings שִׁמְר֖וֹן <WH8110> šim·rō·wn of Shimron וְאֶל־ <WH413> wə·’el- ... מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> me·leḵ ... אַכְשָֽׁף׃ <WH407> ’aḵ·šāp̄ and Achshaph;

וְֽאֶל־ <WH413> wə·’el- to הַמְּלָכִ֞ים <WH4428> ham·mə·lā·ḵîm the kings אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer - מִצְּפ֗וֹן <WH6828> miṣ·ṣə·p̄ō·wn of the north בָּהָ֧ר <WH2022> bā·hār in the mountains, וּבָעֲרָבָ֛ה <WH6160> ū·ḇā·‘ă·rā·ḇāh in the Arabah נֶ֥גֶב <WH5045> ne·ḡeḇ south כִּֽנֲר֖וֹת <WH3672> ki·nă·rō·wṯ of Chinnereth, וּבַשְּׁפֵלָ֑ה <WH8219> ū·ḇaš·šə·p̄ê·lāh in the foothills, ( Hebrew Shephelah or lowlands; that is, the western foothills of Judea; also in verse 16) וּבְנָפ֥וֹת <WH5316> ū·ḇə·nā·p̄ō·wṯ and in Naphoth-dor דּ֖וֹר <WH1756> dō·wr ... ( Or in the heights of Dor; Naphoth-dor is a variant of Naphath-dor; see .) מִיָּֽם׃ <WH3220> mî·yām to the west;

הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <WH3669> hak·kə·na·‘ă·nî to the Canaanites מִמִּזְרָ֣ח <WH4217> mim·miz·rāḥ in the east וּמִיָּ֔ם <WH3220> ū·mî·yām and west; וְהָאֱמֹרִ֧י <WH567> wə·hā·’ĕ·mō·rî to the Amorites, וְהַחִתִּ֛י <WH2850> wə·ha·ḥit·tî Hittites, וְהַפְּרִזִּ֥י <WH6522> wə·hap·pə·riz·zî Perizzites, וְהַיְבוּסִ֖י <WH2983> wə·hay·ḇū·sî and Jebusites בָּהָ֑ר <WH2022> bā·hār in the hill country; וְהַֽחִוִּי֙ <WH2340> wə·ha·ḥiw·wî and to the Hivites תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> ta·ḥaṯ at the foot of חֶרְמ֔וֹן <WH2768> ḥer·mō·wn Hermon בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> bə·’e·reṣ in the land הַמִּצְפָּֽה׃ <WH4709> ham·miṣ·pāh of Mizpah.

וַיֵּצְא֣וּ <WH3318> way·yê·ṣə·’ū came out הֵ֗ם <WH1992> hêm So [these kings] וְכָל־ <WH3605> wə·ḵāl all מַֽחֲנֵיהֶם֙ <WH4264> ma·ḥă·nê·hem their armies, עִמָּ֔ם <WH5973> ‘im·mām with עַם־ <WH5971> ‘am- a multitude רָ֕ב <WH7227> rāḇ as numerous כַּח֛וֹל <WH2344> ka·ḥō·wl as the sand אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ’ă·šer - עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- on שְׂפַת־ <WH8193> śə·p̄aṯ- the seashore הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> hay·yām ..., לָרֹ֑ב <WH7230> lā·rōḇ וְס֥וּס <WH5483> wə·sūs of horses וָרֶ֖כֶב <WH7393> wā·re·ḵeḇ and chariots. רַב־ <WH7227> raḇ- along with a great number מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> mə·’ōḏ ...

וַיִּוָּ֣עֲד֔וּ <WH3259> way·yiw·wā·‘ă·ḏū joined forces כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> kōl All הַמְּלָכִ֣ים <WH4428> ham·mə·lā·ḵîm kings הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> hā·’êl·leh these וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <WH935> way·yā·ḇō·’ū vvv וַיַּחֲנ֤וּ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū and encamped יַחְדָּו֙ <WH3162> yaḥ·dāw - אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- at מֵ֣י <WH4325> mê the waters מֵר֔וֹם <WH4792> mê·rō·wm of Merom לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <WH3898> lə·hil·lā·ḥêm to fight עִם־ <WH5973> ‘im- against יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃פ <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl Israel.

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer said יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah·weh Then the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to יְהוֹשֻׁעַ֮ <WH3091> yə·hō·wō·šu·a‘ Joshua, אַל־ <WH408> ’al- “ Do not תִּירָ֣א <WH3372> tî·rā be afraid מִפְּנֵיהֶם֒ <WH6440> mip·pə·nê·hem of them, כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- for מָחָ֞ר <WH4279> mā·ḥār tomorrow כָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> kā·‘êṯ time הַזֹּ֗את <WH2063> haz·zōṯ by this אָנֹכִ֞י <WH595> ’ā·nō·ḵî I נֹתֵ֧ן <WH5414> nō·ṯên will deliver אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - כֻּלָּ֛ם <WH3605> kul·lām all of them חֲלָלִ֖ים <WH2491> ḥă·lā·lîm slain לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lip̄·nê before יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl Israel. אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - סוּסֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5483> sū·sê·hem their horses תְּעַקֵּ֔ר <WH6131> tə·‘aq·qêr You are to hamstring וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- and מַרְכְּבֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4818> mar·kə·ḇō·ṯê·hem their chariots. ” תִּשְׂרֹ֥ף <WH8313> tiś·rōp̄ burn up בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> bā·’êš ...

וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> way·yā·ḇō came יְהוֹשֻׁ֡עַ <WH3091> yə·hō·wō·šu·a‘ Joshua וְכָל־ <WH3605> wə·ḵāl and his whole עַם֩ <WH5971> ‘am ... הַמִּלְחָמָ֨ה <WH4421> ham·mil·ḥā·māh army עִמּ֧וֹ <WH5973> ‘im·mōw ... עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH5921> ‘ă·lê·hem upon them עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- So by מֵ֥י <WH4325> mê the waters מֵר֖וֹם <WH4792> mê·rō·wm of Merom, פִּתְאֹ֑ם <WH6597> piṯ·’ōm suddenly וַֽיִּפְּל֖וּ <WH5307> way·yip·pə·lū and attacked בָּהֶֽם׃ Prep│3mp ( bā·hem) them,

וַיִּתְּנֵ֨ם <WH5414> way·yit·tə·nêm delivered them יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah·weh and the LORD בְּיַֽד־ <WH3027> bə·yaḏ- into the hand יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl of Israel, וַיַּכּוּם֒ <WH5221> way·yak·kūm who struck them down וַֽיִּרְדְּפ֞וּם <WH7291> way·yir·də·p̄ūm and pursued them עַד־ <WH5704> ‘aḏ- all the way to צִיד֣וֹן <WH6721> ṣî·ḏō·wn Sidon רַבָּ֗ה <WH7227> rab·bāh Greater וְעַד֙ <WH5704> wə·‘aḏ as far as מִשְׂרְפ֣וֹת <WH4956> miś·rə·p̄ō·wṯ ... מַ֔יִם <WH4956> ma·yim and Misrephoth-maim, וְעַד־ <WH5704> wə·‘aḏ- ... בִּקְעַ֥ת <WH1237> biq·‘aṯ the Valley מִצְפֶּ֖ה <WH4708> miṣ·peh of Mizpeh. מִזְרָ֑חָה <WH4217> miz·rā·ḥāh and eastward וַיַּכֻּ֕ם <WH5221> way·yak·kum They struck them down, עַד־ <WH5704> ‘aḏ- ... בִּלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> bil·tî no הִשְׁאִֽיר־ <WH7604> hiš·’îr- leaving לָהֶ֖ם Prep│3mp ( lā·hem) שָׂרִֽיד׃ 8300 N-ms ( śā·rîḏ) survivors.

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> way·ya·‘aś treated לָהֶם֙ Prep│3mp ( lā·hem) them יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ 3091 N-proper-ms ( yə·hō·wō·šu·a‘) Joshua כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר 834 Prep-k│Pro-r ( ka·’ă·šer) as אָֽמַר־ 559 V-Qal-Perf-3ms ( ’ā·mar-) had told ל֖וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) him; יְהוָ֑ה 3068 N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) the LORD אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - סוּסֵיהֶ֣ם 5483 N-mpc│3mp ( sū·sê·hem) their horses עִקֵּ֔ר 6131 V-Piel-Perf-3ms ( ‘iq·qêr) he hamstrung וְאֶת־ 853 Conj-w│DirObjM ( wə·’eṯ-) - מַרְכְּבֹתֵיהֶ֖ם 4818 N-fpc│3mp ( mar·kə·ḇō·ṯê·hem) their chariots. שָׂרַ֥ף 8313 V-Qal-Perf-3ms ( śā·rap̄) and burned up בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ס 784 Prep-b, Art│N-cs ( bā·’êš) ...

וַיָּ֨שָׁב <WH7725> way·yā·šāḇ turned back יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <WH3091> yə·hō·wō·šu·a‘ Joshua בָּעֵ֤ת <WH6256> bā·‘êṯ time הַהִיא֙ <WH1931> ha·hî At that וַיִּלְכֹּ֣ד <WH3920> way·yil·kōḏ and captured אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - חָצ֔וֹר <WH2674> ḥā·ṣō·wr Hazor וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- - מַלְכָּ֖הּ <WH4428> mal·kāh its king הִכָּ֣ה <WH5221> hik·kāh and put בֶחָ֑רֶב <WH2719> ḇe·ḥā·reḇ to the sword, כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- because חָצ֣וֹר <WH2674> ḥā·ṣō·wr Hazor לְפָנִ֔ים <WH6440> lə·p̄ā·nîm formerly הִ֕יא <WH1931> hî was רֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> rōš the head כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- of all הַמַּמְלָכ֥וֹת <WH4467> ham·mam·lā·ḵō·wṯ kingdoms. הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> hā·’êl·leh these

וַ֠יַּכּוּ <WH5221> way·yak·kū [The Israelites] put אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- everyone הַנֶּ֨פֶשׁ <WH5315> han·ne·p̄eš ... אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- - בָּ֤הּ Prep│3fs ( bāh) in [Hazor] לְפִי־ 6310 Prep-l│N-msc ( lə·p̄î-) ... חֶ֙רֶב֙ 2719 N-fs ( ḥe·reḇ) to the sword, הַֽחֲרֵ֔ם 2763 V-Hifil-InfAbs ( ha·ḥă·rêm) devoting [them] to destruction. לֹ֥א 3808 Adv-NegPrt ( lō) Nothing נוֹתַ֖ר 3498 V-Nifal-Perf-3ms ( nō·w·ṯar) remained, כָּל־ 3605 N-msc ( kāl-) - נְשָׁמָ֑ה 5397 N-fs ( nə·šā·māh) that breathed וְאֶת־ 853 Conj-w│DirObjM ( wə·’eṯ-) and חָצ֖וֹר 2674 N-proper-fs ( ḥā·ṣō·wr) Hazor itself. שָׂרַ֥ף 8313 V-Qal-Perf-3ms ( śā·rap̄) [Joshua] burned down בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ 784 Prep-b, Art│N-cs ( bā·’êš) ...

וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- - כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- all עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> ‘ā·rê and their cities הַמְּלָכִֽים־ <WH4428> ham·mə·lā·ḵîm- kings הָ֠אֵלֶּה <WH428> hā·’êl·leh these וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- - כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- - מַלְכֵיהֶ֞ם <WH4428> mal·ḵê·hem ... לָכַ֧ד <WH3920> lā·ḵaḏ captured יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <WH3091> yə·hō·wō·šu·a‘ Joshua וַיַּכֵּ֥ם <WH5221> way·yak·kêm and put them לְפִי־ <WH6310> lə·p̄î- ... חֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> ḥe·reḇ to the sword. הֶחֱרִ֣ים <WH2763> he·ḥĕ·rîm He devoted them to destruction אוֹתָ֑ם <WH853> ’ō·w·ṯām -, כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ka·’ă·šer as צִוָּ֔ה <WH6680> ṣiw·wāh had commanded. מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> mō·šeh Moses עֶ֥בֶד <WH5650> ‘e·ḇeḏ servant יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD’s

רַ֣ק <WH7535> raq Yet כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- any הֶעָרִ֗ים <WH5892> he·‘ā·rîm of the cities הָעֹֽמְדוֹת֙ <WH5975> hā·‘ō·mə·ḏō·wṯ built עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- on תִּלָּ֔ם <WH8510> til·lām their mounds, לֹ֥א <WH3808> lō did not שְׂרָפָ֖ם <WH8313> śə·rā·p̄ām burn יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl Israel זוּלָתִ֛י <WH2108> zū·lā·ṯî except אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - חָצ֥וֹר <WH2674> ḥā·ṣō·wr Hazor, לְבַדָּ֖הּ <WH776> lə·ḇad·dāh ... שָׂרַ֥ף <WH8313> śā·rap̄ burned. יְהוֹשֻֽׁעַ׃ <WH3091> yə·hō·wō·šu·a‘ which Joshua
